CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 10, 1953, pg. 21 reads: "Sponsor - William Brafman, right, sponsor of Belman [sic] Gardens, surveys the culmination of sixteen months' labor at the ground-breaking ceremonies. With him are his wife and Madison Jones, left, race relations consultant with the New York office of FHA, who worked behind the scenes to help bring this first Pittsburgh cooperative to fruition."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mr. and Mr. William Brafman and Madison Jones, standing on site of Belmar Gardens for groundbreaking ceremony
